p: 2-(but-2-en-1-yloxy)-1-isopropyl-4-methylbenzene ( 10): pale yellow oil, 81% yield. 1H-NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3): δ 1.47 (d, J = 7.2 Hz, 6H, 2 × CH 3), 1.98–2.00 (m, 3H, =CH 3), 2.56 (s, 3H, ArCH 3), 3.57–3.61 (m, 1H, CH), 4.66–4.69 (d, 2H, OCH 2), 5.95–6.06 (m, 2H, 2 × =CH), 6.90 (s, 1H, Ar), 6.98 (d, J = 7.5 Hz, 1H, Ar), 7.34 (d, J = 7.8 Hz, 1H, Ar). 13C-NMR (75 MHz, CDCl 3): δ 18.1 (CH 3), 21.5 (ArCH 3), 23.0 (2 × CH 3), 26.8 (CH), 68.9 (OCH 2), 112.9 (Ar), 121.4 (Ar), 126.1 (=CH), 127.0 (Ar), 129.1 (=CH), 134.5 (Ar), 136.3 (Ar), 156.1 (Ar). Mixture of E/ Z isomers with ratio of 5.2/1. For sake of clarity, we have reported only the signals related to the major isomer. Anal. Calcd for C 14H 20O: C, 82.30; H, 9.87. Found: C, 82.33; H, 9.84.
